get.description: This method can be used to check if one of your blogs is followed by another blog
This method can be used to get followers for specific Blog

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results to return: 1–20

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Result to start at

get.description: user can get the posts published by certain blog

parameters.name: api_key
parameters.description: Your OAuth Consumer Key

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of post to return one of the following: text, quote, link, answer, video, audio, photo, chat

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: A specific post ID

parameters.name: tag[]
parameters.description: Limits the response to posts with all these specified tag(s),

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of posts to return

parameters.name: reblog_info
parameters.description: Indicates whether to return reblog information

parameters.name: notes_info
parameters.description: Indicates whether to return notes information

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Indicates whether to return notes information default none

parameters.name: layout
parameters.description: there are different types of layout for posts

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: the state of the post. Specify one of the following: published, draft, queue, private

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Comma-separated tags for this post

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The GMT date and time of the post, as a string

parameters.name: source_url
parameters.description: A source attribution for the post content

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Add a short text summary to the end of the post URL

parameters.name: send_to_twitter
parameters.description: Whether or not to share this via any connected Twitter account on post publish

parameters.name: is_private
parameters.description: Whether this should be a private answer, if this is an answer.

parameters.name: send_to_facebook
parameters.description: Whether or not to share this via any connected Facebook account on post publish

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the ID of the post to edit

get.description: user can get the posts that had been queued

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The number of results to return

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Specifies the post format to return(Html,MarkDown,Rich)

post.summary: reorder a post within the queue

parameters.name: insert_after
parameters.description: Which post ID to move it after, or 0 to make it the first post

get.description: user can get the draft posts

parameters.name: before_id
parameters.description: Return posts that have appeared before this ID

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Specifies the post format to return(Html,MarkDown,Rich)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the ID of the post to delete

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the ID of the reblogged post

parameters.name: comment
